data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
The first-half is now underway.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Dijon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mama Balde of Dijon smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Pablo Sarabia is on target to give PSG a 1-0 advantage.
Great play from Marquinhos to set up the goal.
Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dijon's half?
Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for PSG close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Dijon in their own half.
Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Throw-in for PSG in the half of Dijon.
Throw-in for Dijon at Parc des Princes.
PSG's Thilo Kehrer goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Thomas Leonard signals a throw-in for PSG, close to Dijon's area.
In Paris, Kylian Mbappe (PSG) misses the target with a header.
Thomas Leonard awards Dijon a goal kick.
Throw-in PSG.
PSG's Pablo Sarabia attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Dijon at Parc des Princes.
Free kick for PSG in the half of Dijon.
Free kick Dijon.
Juan Bernat (PSG) gets a yellow card.
The home team replace Angel Di Maria with Julian Draxler.
Dijon are pushing forward but Hamza Mendyl's finish is wide of the goal.
PSG have a goal kick.
Thomas Leonard awards the home team a throw-in.
Thomas Leonard signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Throw-in for PSG at Parc des Princes.
Hamza Mendyl for Dijon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a PSG goal kick.
Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dijon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
PSG are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
PSG to take a throw-in in Dijon territory.
Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for PSG in Paris.
PSG drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In Paris PSG drive forward through Julian Draxler. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to PSG.
PSG pushes forward through Juan Bernat, whose finish on goal is saved.
Dijon needs to be cautious. PSG have an attacking throw-in.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Thomas Leonard.
Thomas Leonard signals a PSG throw-in in Dijon's half.
Thomas Leonard signals a PSG throw-in in Dijon's half.
Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dijon's half?
Julian Draxler for PSG drives towards goal at Parc des Princes. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for PSG in their own half.
Throw-in for PSG in the half of Dijon.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Paris.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
Dijon are coming forward and Mickael Alphonse gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Thomas Leonard awards PSG a goal kick.
PSG's Edinson Cavani misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
Goal kick for Dijon at Parc des Princes.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
PSG's Idrissa Gueye is on target but unsuccessful.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Thomas Leonard.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Paris.
Dijon's Stephy Mavididi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
PSG have a goal kick.
PSG to take a throw-in in Dijon territory.
Throw-in Dijon.
In Paris PSG attack through Kylian Mbappe. The finish is off target, however.
Thomas Leonard awards Dijon a goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Dijon's Runar Runarsson looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Corner awarded to PSG.
Goal kick for Dijon at Parc des Princes.
The first-half has ended.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Runar Runarsson.
The second-half is underway at Parc des Princes.
Corner awarded to PSG.
Marquinhos (PSG) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Paris.
Thomas Leonard awards the home team a throw-in.
In Paris a free kick has been awarded the away team.
PSG have a goal kick.
PSG push forward at Parc des Princes and Pablo Sarabia gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Dijon defence.
Throw-in for Dijon in their own half.
PSG awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Thomas Leonard awards the home team a throw-in.
PSG to take a throw-in in Dijon territory.
The match at Parc des Princes has been interrupted briefly for a check on Mickael Alphonse, who is down injured.
Mickael Alphonse is back on the pitch.
PSG's Edinson Cavani breaks free at Parc des Princes. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
Thomas Leonard awards Dijon a goal kick.
Throw-in for PSG in the half of Dijon.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Thomas Leonard.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Thomas Leonard.
Throw-in for Dijon at Parc des Princes.
Throw-in Dijon.
Frederic Sammaritano is on a sub for Stephy Mavididi for Dijon.
Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Important block from the Dijon defence as Kylian Mbappe fires in a strike for PSG.
Pablo Sarabia hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for PSG!
It's a goal kick for the away team in Paris.
The home team have replaced Edinson Cavani with Mauro Icardi. This is the second substitution made today by Thomas Tuchel.
Thomas Tuchel is making the team's third substitution at Parc des Princes with Leandro Paredes replacing Nianzou Tanguy Kouassi.
Romain Amalfitano is replacing Wesley Lautoa for the away team.
Thomas Leonard signals a free kick to PSG.
Great finish from Kylian Mbappe to give PSG a 2-0 lead.
Julian Draxler instrumental with a fine assist.
Dijon make their third substitution with Jhonder Cadiz replacing Senou Coulibaly.
Thomas Leonard signals a Dijon throw-in in PSG's half.
Thomas Leonard signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Goal! PSG extend their lead to 3-0 through Mauro Icardi.
That's a fine assist from Kylian Mbappe.
Can Dijon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in PSG's half?
Dijon drives forward and Jhonder Cadiz gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Dijon are caught offside.
Dijon's Jhonder Cadiz gets in a shot on goal at Parc des Princes. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Dijon's Romain Amalfitano breaks free at Parc des Princes. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for PSG at Parc des Princes.
Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Thomas Leonard signals a PSG throw-in in Dijon's half.
Kylian Mbappe gets his shot on target but fails to score for PSG.
Dijon have a goal kick.
Ball safe as PSG is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to PSG.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
It's 4-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! PSG extend their lead to 4-0 through Kylian Mbappe.
